org.cloudbus.cloudsim.power.models
Interface PowerModel

All Known Implementing Classes:
PowerModelCubic, PowerModelLinear, PowerModelSqrt, PowerModelSquare
public interface PowerModel

The PowerModel interface needs to be implemented in order to provide a model of power consumption depending on utilization for system components.

Since:
CloudSim Toolkit 2.0
Author:
Anton Beloglazov

Method Summary
 double getPower(double utilization)
          Get power consumption by the utilization percentage according to the power model.

Returns:

Throws:
